FuncDef: This command configures the time to remember this lease and is applicable for unsolicited release conditions such as lease timeout if thelease-hold-time-forcommand is set to the default valueno solicited-releaseand is additionally applicable for normal solicited releases from DHCP clients if thelease-hold-time-forcommand is set tosolicited-release.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the amount of time to remember the lease.
